SageTVPlugin.Name: Phoenix Core Services
SageTVPlugin.Description: Phoenix Core Services provides the following services * automatic metadata and fanart fetching from external sources such as TheMovieDB, and TVDb. * dynamic menus * custom views * user profiles * weather
SageTVPlugin.Author: stuckless,jusjoken,bialio,meinmaui
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
3.0.2 * Xml Validation will not completely fail if there are missing views, filters, sources, etc. It will continue to load the views and flag the views with errors. * Fixed bug where WeatherAPI was generating with compile errors.
3.0.1 * Fix for unicode filenames
3.0.0 * requires SageTV 9 * requires Java 1.7+ * removed upnp support * removed nest support * upgraded tvdb api * upgraded tmdb api * rewrote filename scraping
